live_updates: Technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
52595.summary: Some customers in the Maillardville area of Coquitlam are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
52595.title: Aug 16 - Coquitlam (Maillardville) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
